Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Category: SCARAB, SEAL, SCARABOID, INTAGLIO AND SIMILAR OBJECTS
Name: Cowry-shaped object
Description: Cowry-shaped object, actually a rounded amulet in the shape of a cowry shell with serrated edges. A few geometrical signs are inscribed surrounding the Ankh sign ("life") and the nefer sign ("beautiful, good, perfect").
